org.xadisk.connector.outbound
Class XADiskUserLocalTransaction

java.lang.Object
  org.xadisk.connector.outbound.XADiskUserLocalTransaction

public class XADiskUserLocalTransaction
extends Object

This class is applicable only when invoking XADisk as a JCA Resource Adapter.

This represents a transaction object which can be used by JavaEE applications when they want to control the transaction on an XADiskConnection by themselves (in a resource-local way, not using XA transaction). Applications need to call getUserLocalTransaction to obtain a handle to this transaction object.

Since:
1.0

Method Summary
 void beginLocalTransaction()
          Starts a local transaction on the associated connection, and binds that transaction to this object.

          Commits the local transaction bound to this object.

          Gets the transaction timeout value for the current transaction.
 void rollbackLocalTransaction()
          Rolls back the local transaction bound to this object.

          Sets the transaction timeout value for the current transaction.

Gets the transaction timeout value for the current transaction.
